body.quiz: Which of the following from the audio can be used to complete the sentence?
body.answer: Audio for 开朗 kāilǎng
options: Audio for 男孩 nánhái

body.correct: Excellent job! 我很... Wǒ hěn… (I am very…) is used to describe one’s appearance or personality, and the adjective 开朗 kāilǎng (outgoing) is a good fit for it.
body.incorrect: So close! Please listen again several times to try to catch both words.

body.quiz: Which of the following can the phrase in the audio be used to describe?
body.correct: Wonderful job! 高 gāo (tall) is used to describe the height of a person or vertical objects such as trees, mountains, or buildings.
body.incorrect: So close! Please listen again and pay attention to the single initial and final.
